channel.title: Actionbutton?
channel.description:
I'm using a Delta, non-renamed client, and I'm trying too find the method for when you hit a button (declared as actionbutton in server)
I am pretty sure the packetType for actionbuttons is '185' (I took a look at case 185 in parseIncomingPackets method) And I searched through the client's client class for '185', but all I could find was some ints declared with 185, and 185 used in some methods, but as it's non-renamed, I'm having huge trouble finding out what is what...
Any help or waypoint of how too locate this method is appreciated
EDIT: If someone gave me the method(or class) name of outgoing packets, that would give me a hand

item.title: Actionbutton?
item.dc:creator: @jailed jailed
item.description:
